title: Proof Patterns
summary: Reusable proof patterns that show credibility without naming vendors or overloading buyers with case detail.

sections.title: Proof beats claims
sections.body: Use pattern-based proof modules to show evidence consistently across pages, decks, and proposals.

patterns.title: Bold category stance
patterns.description: Define a clear category point of view and reinforce it across every major page. The goal is fast recognition, not provocative language.
whatToShow: Before vs after operating model visual
Consistent terminology across navigation and headers
evidence: Engagement metrics on category explainer content

patterns.title: Vertical credibility
patterns.description: Show domain familiarity through workflow context, not broad claims. Buyers should recognize their environment immediately.

patterns.title: Methodology-first trust
patterns.description: Establish confidence with a visible method and explicit decision gates. This lowers perceived risk for complex programs.

patterns.title: Outcome-backed proof
patterns.description: Pair every strategic claim with concrete operating outcomes. Keep numbers contextual and easy to interpret.
evidence: Audit trail or run history snapshot

patterns.title: Custom build wins when off-the-shelf breaks
patterns.description: Use this pattern when prepackaged tools cannot fit core workflows without heavy compromise. Focus on continuity and governance outcomes.
whatToShow: Governance and ownership model after launch
